mapper.select: select * from INSHQuotetotalinfo where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHQuotetotalinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},agentnum = #{agentnum},agentname = #{agentname},team = #{team},insurancearea = #{insurancearea},riskcode = #{riskcode},insprovincecode = #{insprovincecode},insprovincename = #{insprovincename},inscitycode = #{inscitycode},inscityname = #{inscityname},isrenewal = #{isrenewal},insurancebooks = #{insurancebooks},webpagekey = #{webpagekey},cloudstate = #{cloudstate},handersupplier = #{handersupplier},lastyearsupplier = #{lastyearsupplier},userid = #{userid},purchaserid = #{purchaserid},lzgshareid = #{lzgshareid},callbackurl = #{callbackurl},purchaserchannel = #{purchaserchannel},sourcefrom = #{sourcefrom},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
